      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,86) size 784x54
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 778x54
          text run at (0,0) width 222: "Table B has two cells, B1 and B2. "
          text run at (221,0) width 259: "B1 has a fixed pixel height of 30 pixels. "
          text run at (479,0) width 167: "B2 has a height of 100%. "
          text run at (645,0) width 133: "In IE, this causes B2"
          text run at (0,18) width 773: "to stretch to fill the entire height of cell A2, while in Netscape 6 / Gecko, it seems to have no impact on the height of cell"
          text run at (0,36) width 24: "A2."
